project_descr: In coordination with the Prime Minister's Office/Office for Good Governance and Human Rights and the Agency for Gender Equality, UNDP is planning to undertake a research/survey regarding persons with disabilities to identify the urgent needs.

outputs.output_descr: Preparation of a report on situation of people with disabilities in Kosovo with main priorities to be addressed and collected data to serve as a base line for prioritizing actions defined by the Office of the Prime Minister/Office of Good governance Disability Action Plan (DAP). Furthermore, acquired data will provide substantial information to civil society representatives advocating for specific groups of citizens living with various disabilities, with a special focus on women with disabilities, who may double marginalized, and minority women, who may be triply marginalized.

project_title: population survey for the persons with disabilities
